title: Smartphone ownership in the U.S. 2015 - 2018 , by age group
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 4 lines namely 18-29, 30-49, 50-64, and 65+. The y axis represents Percentage of respondents and the x axis represents Year.
Overall 18-29, 30-49, 50-64, and 65+ are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Percentage of respondents in descending order is: 1. 18-29, 2. 30-49, 3. 50-64, and lastly, 4. 65+.
Throughout the period, 18-29 generally had the highest Percentage of respondents relative to others with an average of 92.0, and it reached its maximum at 2018 with a value of 96.0.
After 18-29, 30-49 overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 88.0, peaking at 2018.
The botommost line, 65+,  has a mean of 42.75, and peaked at 2018.
